Headline: Harlem-bound Green and 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green and 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Clinton. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green and 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Clinton.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #81W West Lawrence Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Lawrence/Milwaukee
ShortDescription: Eastbound 81W West Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Central, HIggins, and Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Lawrence/Milwaukee.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #81W West Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Central, HIggins, and Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Lawrence/Milwaukee.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 91 Austin Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Lawrence/MIlwaukee
ShortDescription: Eastbound 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Lawrence, Central, Higgins, and Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Lawrence/MIlwaukee.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Lawrence, Central, Higgins, and Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Lawrence/Milwaukee.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
